attributes.action: to allow  live in family members to be officially paid as carers for their loved ones.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the Daily Mail January 14th 2008 an article appeared headed BROWN PROMISES A DECENT WAGE FOR FAMILY CARERS.  I would like to see this in place and in operation before the next general election.  It is shameful that family members who dedicate their lives to looking after disabled family members or elderly parents are still treated like second class citizens.  We want to be respected and counted as valueable members of society.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "to allow live in family members to be officially paid as carers for their loved ones."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
